data.name: ERR_HourlyContractedUser_Message
data.value: {0} is an hourly contracted user and therefore, FlexiBalances do not apply to " + {1} + ". This page cannot be viewed."

data.name: ERR_HourlyContractedUser_Title
data.value: FlexiTime does not apply to {0}

data.name: ERR_NoActivityForDelete_Message
data.value: The activity being deleted could not be found. Delete cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoActivityForUpdate_Message
data.value: The activity being updated could not be found. Update of activity cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoClientForContactCreate_Message
data.value: The client to which this contact would be assigned could not be found. Creation of the contact was cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoClientForContactDelete_Message
data.value: The client of the contact being deleted could not be found. Delete of contact cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoClientForContactUpdate_Message
data.value: The client that owns this contact could not be found. Update of contact was cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoClientForContact_Message
data.value: The client could not be found and therefore, the contact cannot be retrieved.

data.name: ERR_NoClientForRetrieveContactList_Message
data.value: The selected client could not be found. The look up for contacts of the client was cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoClient_Message
data.value: The selected client could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NoContactForUpdate_Message
data.value: The contact being updated could not be found. Update to contact cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoContact_Message
data.value: The selected contact could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NonTimeCapturerUser_Message
data.value: {0} does not have the 'Time Capturer' role and therefore, this page cannot be viewed for {1}.

data.name: ERR_NonTimeCapturerUser_Title
data.value: {0} is not a 'Time Capturer'

data.name: ERR_NoPermissionToViewPage_Message
data.value: You do not have the required permissions to view this page.

data.name: ERR_NoProjectForActivityCreate_Message
data.value: The project that would own the activity being created could not be found. Creation of activity cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoProjectForActivityDelete_Message
data.value: The project that owns the activity being deleted could not be found. Delete of activity cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoProjectForActivityList_Message
data.value: The project could not be found, therefore, no activities for the project could be displayed.

data.name: ERR_NoProjectForActivityUpdate_Message
data.value: The project that owns the activity being updated could not be found. Update of activity cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoProjectForActivity_Message
data.value: The project that the selected activity belongs to could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NoProjectForUpdate_Message
data.value: The selected project could not be found. Update to project cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoProject_Message
data.value: The selected project could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NoUser_Message
data.value: The selected user could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NoWorkAllocationForNoteCreateUpdate_Message
data.value: The work allocation to which this note belongs could not be found. Save cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoWorkSession_Message
data.value: The context work session could not be found.

data.name: ERR_WeekendPublicHoliday_Message
data.value: The selected date is either a public holiday or a weekend.

data.name: ERR_NoWorkAllocationFound_Message
data.value: The requested work allocation could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NoExpense_Message
data.value: The selected expense could not be found

data.name: ERR_CreateExpense_Message
data.value: An expense can only be created for yourself

data.name: ERR_NoRegion_Message
data.value: The selected region could not be found.

data.name: ERR_NoRegionForUpdate_Message
data.value: The selected region could not be found. Update to region cancelled.

data.name: ERR_NoRegionName_Message
data.value: Please enter a region name.

data.name: ERR_NoRegionShortCode_Message
data.value: Please enter a region short code.

data.name: ERR_NoRegionStatus_Message
data.value: Please select a region status.

data.name: ERR_NoPermissionToUpdateRegion
data.value: You do not have the required permissions to edit a region. Save cancelled.
